name: Predict RA dataShoesList
description: PREDICT RA is a completely new concept in road running. It uses an ultra-decoupled, super-stable, highly cushioned bottom unit, mated to a totally new upper that moves with you, for a new road-running experience. Predict gives runners the smoothest ride of any shoe out there.

name: SONIC 3 ACCELERATE
description: The lightweight SONIC 3 ACCELERATE training shoe is packed with features designed to optimize your speed training: Optivibe reduces vibrations to limit muscle fatigue, a geometric decoupling axis promotes a quick forward transition and road-specific Sensifit fits your foot like a glove.

name: SONIC 3 CONFIDENCE
description: The SONIC 3 CONFIDENCE training shoe is packed with features to give you extra assurance on the road. Optivibe reduces vibrations to limit muscle fatigue, a geometric decoupling axis delivers a more secure forward transition and reinforced road-specific Sensifit fits your foot like a glove.

name: SENSE RIDE 3
description: Ideal for all your trail adventures, the SENSE RIDE 3 draws on road-running standards to provide overall comfort and soft cushioning. For extra grip and protection, the go-to shoe is also packed with trail-specific features like anti-debris mesh, a ground filter and grippy Contagrip® outsole.

name: SPEEDCROSS 5 GTX
description: The latest version of the icon. SPEEDCROSS 5 GTX has a new GORE-TEX construction with a floating tongue that improves comfort and streamlines the overall look and feel of the shoe. It maintains the renown grip, outstanding cushioning, and precise fit that have made this shoe a favorite.

name: ULTRABOOST 20 SHOES
description: A new day. A new run. Make it your best. These high-performance shoes feature a foot-hugging knit upper. Stitched-in reinforcement is precisely placed to give you support in the places you need it most. The soft elastane heel delivers a more comfortable fit. Responsive cushioning returns energy to your stride with every footstrike for that I-could-run-forever feeling.

name: XA-COMP ADV
description: The XA-COMP ADV offers a steady and protective package that delivers speed on varying grounds.

name: SPEEDCROSS 3 ADV
description: Our legendary Speedcross lug pattern gives you maximum traction on the move.

name: S/LAB XT-6 SOFTGROUND LT ADV
description: The legacy of the S/LAB XT-6 is revisited and offered in a range of never before seen colour combinations for this shoe.

name: Ultraboost
description: A new day. A new run. Make it your best. These high-performance shoes feature a foot-hugging knit upper. Stitched-in reinforcement is precisely placed to give you support in the places you need it most. The soft elastane heel delivers a more comfortable fit. Responsive cushioning returns energy to your stride with every footstrike for that I-could-run-forever feeling.

name: ADIZERO BOSTON 8
description: Whether you're tackling Boston's iconic Heartbreak Hill or sticking closer to home, these running shoes will keep you comfortable from the starting gun to the final push. With lightweight construction, responsive cushioning and an energized ride, they're your go-to racing shoes for distances ranging from a full marathon to a chocolate milk mile.

name: EDGE GAMEDAY
description: Every run leads right up to game day. Keeping that in mind, these versatile adidas shoes feature energized cushioning and a locked-down fit for nimble agility. Underfoot, a turf-inspired outsole delivers great grip no matter where you're prepping to play.

name: POWERLIFT 4 SHOES
description: Take your weight training sessions to new heights. Made for stability, these weightlifting shoes have a narrow fit, a midsole wedge and a wide instep strap for complete lockdown. A rubber outsole keeps you firmly planted when lifting. The lightweight upper is made from durable canvas.

name: ROGUERA SHOES
description: Feel the power of the fitness trends of the '80s. These shoes modernize a classic workout look with all-day style and comfort. They feature a coated leather upper and an iconic twin-cup midsole to give you more spring in your step.

name: STRUTTER SHOES
description: Delivering the dadliest of dad vibes, these shoes have a chunky design that keeps you comfortable throughout your day. The smooth leather upper is detailed with cutouts, overlays and signature 3-Stripes. It's anchored on a high-profile sculpted midsole and a grippy outsole

name: NIZZA TREFOIL SHOES
description: You didn't have to live in the '70s to understand the vibe. Just like you don't have to have skateboarded to appreciate the style. You can showcase both, which is exactly what these adidas Nizza Trefoil Shoes do. The clean, minimalist style is all about ease. So lace up and settle into their comfort.

name: SUPERSTAR SHOES
description: Celebrate 50 years of shell toes with over-the-top Trefoil style. The adidas Superstar Shoe is an icon that's been shaped over 50 years. It was a game-changer in the '70s as B-ball's first leather low top. In the '80s, it was a scene-maker vital to the hip hop music and fashion that were emerging as a global phenomenon. These shoes introduce a bold note with a blown-up Trefoil graphic. As always, the adidas Superstar sneaker is ready to shake things up. Go forth and be bold.

name: NMD R1
description: The past inspires the future. These NMD_R1 Shoes combine the best of adidas' latest technical innovations with a look that honors the past. Responsive cushioning and a stretchy, sock-like upper give a supremely comfortable feel.

name: React Infinity Run Flyknit
description: The Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit is designed to keep you on the run. More foam and improved upper details provide a secure and cushioned feel. Lace up and feel the potential as you hit the road.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 37
description: Reinvigorate your stride with the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 37. Delivering the same fit and feel that runners love, the shoe has an all-new forefoot cushioning unit and foam for maximum responsiveness. The result is a durable, lightweight trainer designed for everyday running.

name: Nike Free RN Flyknit 3
description: The Nike Free RN Flyknit 3.0 Ву You is а huge leap forward in the evolution of the Free. lts stretchy, yet supportive upper provides security without weighing you down. Choose the 3.0 outsole for а barefoot feel that's lighter and closer to the ground than previous versions. The 5.0 outsole features an updated flex groove pattern and modified midsole foam that offers comfortaЫe cushioning without sacrificing the natural motion of your foot.

name: Nike SuperRep Go
description: The Nike SuperRep Go combines comfortable foam cushioning, flexibility and support to get you moving in circuit-based fitness classes or while streaming workouts at home.

name: Nike Romaleos 4
description: Designed for strength and stability, the Nike Romaleos 4 features a supportive midsole and a wide, flat outsole. Adjustable straps at the midfoot secure your foot during your most intense workouts.

name: Nike Air Zoom SuperRep
description: The Nike Air Zoom SuperRep is designed for circuit training, HIIT, short runs and other fast-paced exercise. Zoom Air cushioning in the forefoot combines with a wide, stable heel to keep you moving and lifting comfortably.

name: Nike Blazer Mid 77
description: The Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage harnesses the old-school look of Nike Basketball with a vintage midsole finish, making it look like you've been saving them for years.

name: Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit 3
description: Be bouncy and buoyant in the Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit 3. The upper features flowing 2-tone lines of breathable, stretchable Flyknit construction for unique, street-ready style. Revolutionary VaporMax technology keeps a spring in your step with toe-to-heel cushioning.

name: NikeCourt Royale
description: Taking inspiration from the archives, the NikeCourt Royale Men's Shoe brings retro tennis style in a modern package for everyday comfort.
